meanings.definition: To come together for a meeting or gathering.
meanings.sent1: Our family is convening for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: The team is convening to discuss the project.
meanings.sent3: Convening for a game night always leads to laughter.
meanings.sent4: The birds convening on the tree branches created a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: Convening under the starlit sky felt magical.

meanings.definition: To assemble or gather for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The volunteers are convening to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: Students are convening in the library for a study session.
meanings.sent3: Convening to bake cookies turned into a messy but fun activity.
meanings.sent4: The clouds convening in the sky signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: Convening to plan the surprise party was full of excitement.
